articles.author: Gabe Cohn
articles.title: ‘Little Women’ Opens Strong at the Box Office
articles.description: Greta Gerwig’s movie was a hit at theaters this weekend, even as “Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker” still dominates.
articles.content:
For moviegoers, the holiday weekend was a choice of extremes. 
Of the top five movies at domestic theaters, two were live-action franchise behemoths (Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker,Jumanji: The Next Level); two were genial animated films with obvious appea… [+1569 chars]

articles.author: Neil Genzlinger
articles.title: Sleepy LaBeef, a Rockabilly Mainstay, Is Dead at 84
articles.description: He never had what would be considered a hit record. But he gained a following for his ever-changing live shows and constant touring.
articles.content:
It was at the Fifth Wheel that Mr. Guralnick, who lived nearby, first went with a friend to see Mr. LaBeef.
I had traveled thousands of miles to hear music like this, played in just this kind of setting, he wrote, and as Sleepy ran through what must have bee… [+987 chars]

articles.author: Abdi Latif Dahir
articles.title: On ‘Shoestring Budget,’ Terrorist Group Al Shabab Poses Deadly Threat in Somalia
articles.description: The group suspected in a weekend attack that killed 79 people has lost territory, suffered defections and been targeted by United States airstrikes. But it can still mount large attacks.
articles.content: Just over two years ago, a double truck bombing killed nearly 600 people at a busy crossroads in Mogadishu. While the Shabab didnt take responsibility, it was similar to others carried out by the group that involved packing a vehicle with explosives to breach… [+1416 chars]

articles.title: Texas Church Shooting: 2 Dead, 1 Critically Wounded, Officials Say
articles.description: A motive for the shooting, at the West Freeway Church of Christ in White Settlement, Texas, was unclear.
articles.content:
He said the shooting had happened near the beginning of the service.
This is quite obviously to us a random act that is disturbing, Mr. Tinius said. We are continuing to hold on to what we believe that doesnt change.

articles.author: Siobhan Burke
articles.title: Can a Blind-Date Dance Lead to Love?
articles.description: On the TV dating show “Flirty Dancing,” dance is not an activity to be perfected or judged but a meaningful way for people to connect.
articles.content: Thats another factor setting Flirty Dancing apart from other dance reality shows: It reveals just how vulnerable dancers need to be, how the physical is psychological and vice versa. Mr. Wall, who worked on three episodes, said his job as a choreographer went… [+1457 chars]

articles.author: Nicholas Kristof
articles.title: Kristof: Why 2019 has been the best year in human history
articles.description: Why 2019 Has Been the Best Year in Human History
articles.content:
If youre depressed by the state of the world, let me toss out an idea: In the long arc of human history, 2019 has been the best year ever.
The bad things that you fret about are true. But its also true that since modern humans emerged about 200,000 years ago… [+6182 chars]

articles.title: Museums, Diversity and Philanthropy
articles.description: Museum officials discuss the challenge of ensuring diversity and the essential role of philanthropists.
articles.content:
To the Editor:
Re How the Superrich Captured the Art World, by Michael Massing (Sunday Review, Dec. 15):
Art museums as we know them in the United States owe their very existence to the philanthropists Michael Massing disdains. Such educationally and civic-… [+954 chars]

articles.title: Is Biden the Best to Take On Trump?
articles.description: Readers discuss a Frank Bruni column in which he takes a second look and views the former vice president more favorably.
articles.content:
To the Editor:
Re Give Biden His Due, by Frank Bruni (column, Dec. 22):
A man of conscience, Mr. Bruni has made a course correction in his honest effort to critique the candidates. Joe Biden has consistently been demoted by most of the press. However, we fi… [+904 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s New Policy on Bird Deaths: ‘Callous and Irresponsible’
articles.description: A reader finds it “profoundly sad” that his grandchildren may not enjoy the diversity of bird life that he has.
articles.content:

It is ironic that on Christmas Day you ran a front-page story detailing the Trump administrations continued assaults on the Migratory Bird Treaty Act and various other environmental protections having to do with birds and other forms of wildli… [+937 chars]

articles.author: Aimee Ortiz and Mihir Zaveri
articles.title: Winter Storm Expected to Bring Snow and Ice to Northeast
articles.description: The storm threatened to complicate holiday travel as it moved east from the Midwest, but forecasters said most major airports would be spared from the worst.
articles.content:
Road travel, particularly in the upper Midwest or the Great Plains, could be dangerous, he said.
As the storm intensifies, strong winds will affect some of these areas, causing poor visibility and making the driving conditions quite hazardous, if not locally… [+377 chars]
